title: Demonstration
text: We can put $$3$$ inside the absolute value, which is $$|3\left(x-2\right)|$$
speech: We can put  3  inside the absolute value, which is  the absolute value of 3 times, parentheses x minus 2, , end absolute value
pacedSpeech: inside the absolute value, which is   the absolute value of 3 times,  x minus 2, , end absolute value

title: Demonstration
speech: Two cases:  3 times, parentheses x minus 2,   if  x minus 2 is greater than or equal to 0  and  negative 3 times, parentheses x minus 2,   if  x minus 2 is less than 0
pacedSpeech: if   x minus 2 is greater than or equal to 0
if   x minus 2 is less than 0

title: Demonstration
speech: Simplify:  3 x minus 6  if  x is greater than or equal to 2  and  negative 3 times x plus 6  if  x is less than 2
